results.title: Colonic ulcers accompanying collagenous colitis: implication of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.
results.text_hl: The outcome was not available in one @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@. Of the two @<m>DISEASE_Colitis_Collagenous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046729 @@@CC-U@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who did not use NSAIDs, one @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor), and the @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ resolved after stopping the drug; the @DISEASE_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulceration@@@ in the second @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was thought to be @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ in origin.

citations.NLM: Kakar S, Pardi DS, Burgart LJ. Colonic ulcers accompanying collagenous colitis: implication of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs. Am J Gastroenterol. 2003 Aug;98(8):1834-7. PMID: 12907340
